name: LeftVentricularAssistDevicePlacement
title: Left Ventricular Assist Device Placement
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts of procedures for left ventricular assist device placement.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent procedures for left ventricular and biventricular device placement.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

contains.display: Implantation of left cardiac ventricular assist device (procedure)
Implantation of cardiac biventricular assist device (procedure)
Insertion of ventricular assist device; extracorporeal, biventricular
Replacement of extracorporeal ventricular assist device, single or biventricular, pump(s), single or each pump
Insertion of ventricular assist device, percutaneous, including radiological supervision and interpretation; left heart, arterial access only
Insertion of ventricular assist device, percutaneous, including radiological supervision and interpretation; left heart, both arterial and venous access, with transseptal puncture
Repositioning of percutaneous right or left heart ventricular assist device with imaging guidance at separate and distinct session from insertion
Temporary implantation of left cardiac ventricular assist device (procedure)
